settings.name: Zoom Range
settings.description: Sets the zoom range for functions other than optical zoom

settings.name: Zoom Speed
settings.description: Sets the zoom speed when using custom key for zoom operation

settings.name: Zoom Speed (Remote)
settings.description: Sets zoom speed when using remote commander

settings.name: Zoom Ring Rotate
settings.description: Assigns zoom in/out functions to the zoom ring rotation direction

settings.name: Zoom Ring Function
settings.description: Sets the behavior of the zoom ring on the lens
